name: Devil
text: Ah yes. I've heard of you and the situation you're in. I'm a devil and I can offer you a way to protect yourself.

name: Terry
text: This deal isn't free. Is it?

name: Devil
text: No it's not it'll cost you 1 heart of your maximum health, but I promise you it's worth it.

name: Terry
text: Can I think about it first?

name: Devil
text: Nope, once you've started talking to me, you've locked yourself in your deal

name: Devil
text: I have given you a sword to defend yourself. Good luck!

name: Devil
text: We've made a deal already. Go on your way.
